verses.text: \w The|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H5002"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: “\w Sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w make|strong="H7896"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* enemies \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w footstool|strong="H1916"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*.”\f + \fr 110:1 \ft Cited in Matthew 22:44, Mark 12:36; Luke 20:42–43, Acts 2:34–35, and Hebrews 1:13\f*

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w extends|strong="H5797"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w mighty|strong="H5797"\w* \w scepter|strong="H4294"\w* \w from|strong="H7971"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*: “\w Rule|strong="H7287"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* enemies.”

\w Your|strong="H3117"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w shall|strong="H5971"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* \w willing|strong="H5071"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w Your|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w battle|strong="H3117"\w*. Arrayed \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w splendor|strong="H1926"\w*, \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w womb|strong="H7358"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w dawn|strong="H4891"\w*, \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w You|strong="H3117"\w* belongs \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w dew|strong="H2919"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Your|strong="H3117"\w* \w youth|strong="H3208"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w change|strong="H5162"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w mind|strong="H5162"\w*: “\w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w forever|strong="H5769"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w order|strong="H1700"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Melchizedek|strong="H4442"\w*.”\f + \fr 110:4 \ft Cited in Hebrews 5:6, Hebrews 7:17, and Hebrews 7:21\f*

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3225"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w Your|strong="H5921"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*; \w He|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w crush|strong="H4272"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w His|strong="H5921"\w* wrath.

\w He|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* \w judge|strong="H1777"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, heaping \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w dead|strong="H1472"\w*; \w He|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* \w crush|strong="H4272"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w leaders|strong="H7218"\w* \w far|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H7218"\w* wide.

\w He|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H5158"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w brook|strong="H5158"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w road|strong="H1870"\w*; \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w He|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H5158"\w* \w lift|strong="H7311"\w* \w up|strong="H7311"\w* \w His|strong="H5921"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*.
